verses.verse: And it came to pass in the <S%H702>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1867>Darius<s%>, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> in the <S%H702>fourth<s%> day of the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, even in <S%H3691>Chislev<s%>.

Now they of <S%H1004>Beth<s%> - <S%H410>el<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H8272>Sharezer<s%> and <S%H7278>Regem-melech<s%>, and their <S%H582>men<s%>, to <S%H2470>entreat<s%> the <S%H6440>favor<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>,

and to <S%H559>speak<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, and to the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Should I <S%H1058>weep<s%> in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, <S%H5144>separating<s%> <S%H6213>myself<s%>, as I have done these so many <S%H8141>years<s%>?
Then came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Speak <S%H559><s%> unto all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, and to the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, When ye <S%H6684>fasted<s%> and <S%H5594>mourned<s%> in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> and in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H7657>month<s%>, even these seventy <S%H8141>years<s%>, did ye at <S%H6684>all<s%> fast unto <S%H6684>me<s%>, even to me?
And when ye <S%H398>eat<s%>, and when ye <S%H8354>drink<s%>, do not ye <S%H398>eat<s%> for <S%H8354>yourselves<s%>, and drink for yourselves?

Should ye not hear the <S%H1697>words<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, when <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> was <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> and in <S%H7961>prosperity<s%>, and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof round about <S%H5439>her<s%>, and the <S%H5045>South<s%> and the <S%H8219>lowland<s%> were <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>?

Thus hath <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H559>spoken<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H8199>Execute<s%> <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, and <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and <S%H7356>compassion<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H251>brother<s%>;

and <S%H6231>oppress<s%> not the <S%H490>widow<s%>, nor the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, the <S%H1616>sojourner<s%>, nor the <S%H6041>poor<s%>; and let none of you <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H376>against<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart<s%>.
But they <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H7181>hearken<s%>, and pulled <S%H5414>away<s%> the <S%H3802>shoulder<s%>, and <S%H3513>stopped<s%> their <S%H241>ears<s%>, that they might not <S%H8085>hear<s%>.

Yea <S%H7760><s%>, they made their <S%H3820>hearts<s%> as an adamant <S%H8068>stone<s%>, lest they should <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%>, and the <S%H1697>words<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> by his <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H5030>prophets<s%>: therefore there came <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7110>wrath<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

And it is come to pass <S%H7121>that<s%>, as he cried, and they would not <S%H8085>hear<s%>, so they shall <S%H7121>cry<s%>, and I will not <S%H8085>hear<s%>, <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>;

but I will scatter them with a <S%H5590>whirlwind<s%> among all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> which they have not <S%H3045>known<s%>. Thus the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5674>them<s%>, so that no man passed through nor <S%H7725>returned<s%>: for they <S%H7760>laid<s%> the <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8047>desolate<s%>.
